text: Véronique Schiltz (23 December 1942 – 4 February 2019) was a French archaeologist, historian of art, and literary translator. Her works focused on steppes art. She was a member of the Académie des Inscriptions et Belles- Lettres from 2011, and an Officer of the Legion of Honour. Schiltz died in Paris on 4 February 2019, aged 76. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French historians Category:French archaeologists Category:Writers from Paris Category:French translators
title: Véronique Schiltz
